name: Speco
description: Speco is a social enterprise that offers housekeeping and cleaning services to provide stable jobs to marginalised Singaporeans including ex-offenders, people with disabilities and single parents.Speco uses its own Speco® product, an antimicrobial coating that sanitises and actively protects.
